text: Roman Andreyevich Kartsev (, born Roman Antshelevich Katz ();Роман Карцев: фильмография и биография, все фильмы с участием Роман КарцеваБиография Романа Карцева 20 May 1939 – 2 October 2018) was a Russian actor and comedian. He was born in Odesa, Ukraine. He was known for his roles in Heart of a Dog, Promised Heaven, and in Old Hags. Kartsev died on 2 October 2018 in Moscow from cardiac arrest at the age of 79.Умер Роман Карцев ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Actors from Odesa Category:Soviet movie actors Category:Russian movie actors Category:Soviet Jews Category:Russian Jews Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Russian comedians
title: Roman Kartsev
